items.sentence: If you don\'t think of an excuse quickly, things will become awkward.
I had to wait for a long time for Tom\'s answer, but it was worth it.
I just want you to know that I won\'t be able to come to your picnic.
Tom told me he planned to visit Mary the next time he went to Boston.
Tom would have apologized to Mary if he had thought it was important.
We heard some strange noises coming from the cellar during the night.
What I don\'t understand is why Tom didn\'t stick around and help us.
I don\'t know when I\'ll be able to pay you back the money I owe you.
I want Tom to ask Mary if she\'s planning to go to Australia with us.
Tom and Mary were supposed to take their dog to the vet this morning.
Tom could have survived if the ambulance had arrived a little sooner.
Tom was knocked off his bicycle and killed in a hit and run accident.
Tom was very unhappy about having to spend Christmas in the hospital.
Tom wrote Mary a text message, but then deleted it before sending it.
Tom said that he was planning to eat the whole watermelon by himself.
Tom speaks French better than any of the other students in his class.
Tom ruined our camping trip by forgetting to put the tent in the car.
Mary doesn\'t like it when Tom leaves his dirty clothes on the floor.
After what happened, I would\'ve thought Tom would go back to Boston.
Please don\'t hesitate to contact me if you have any other questions.
